name: roamify
description: Roamify is a full-stack travel blogging app where users can explore travel memories through an interactive map. Built with React, and Node.js, the app allows you to create location-based travel entries and visualize them directly on a world map.

scripts.install-all: npm install --workspace client && npm install --workspace server
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace client && npm run build --workspace server
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace client" "npm run dev --workspace server"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace client" "npm run start --workspace server"

author: Apurv Maurya
